jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.description: We're looking for a creative Social Media Manager with graphics design skills to grow our online presence and engage with our community.
requirements: Proficiency in Canva, Adobe Photoshop, or similar design tools
Experience creating content for Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn
Knowledge of Nigerian real estate/tech space is a plus

jobs.title: Interns
jobs.description: Join our internship program and gain hands-on experience in a fast-growing tech startup. Open positions in Operations, Marketing, and Customer Support.
requirements: Strong interest in technology and real estate
Willingness to learn and take initiative
Basic computer skills (MS Office, Google Suite)
Must be based in Kaduna or willing to relocate

jobs.title: Senior Django Developer
jobs.description: We're seeking an experienced Django developer to help build and scale our platform. You'll work on backend systems, APIs, and integrations.
requirements: Strong understanding of REST APIs and database design
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Ability to work independently in a remote environment
Previous startup experience is a plus
